Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Adrian's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Adrian joined a community called the Alexandria Safe Zone . Adrian is killed when the Wolves invade Alexandria and start ransacking houses and murdering residents. As Carol sneaks around the community in disguise, she witnesses a Wolf mutilating Adrian's body before using his blood to write a "W" on his forehead. The next day, Adrian's body is gathered by Tobin and Bruce and buried along with the other slain Alexandrians. His name is then added to the memorial wall by Betsy and two other women .
Death[]: Killed By Aaron (Indirectly Caused) Aaron leaves his backpack at Del Arno Foods, which causes the Wolves to locate and attack Alexandria. The Wolves As the Wolves make their way into Alexandria, Adrian is one of the many residents to be killed.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Adrian has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: Similar to how the recurring extras killed off in "JSS" got their names, many of the stunt people who portrayed Alexandrians killed by the Wolves were named based off the first letter of their real name, such as Adrian.
Name: Adrian
